Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 74th overall pick, by Troy in 1954...
Injured on 5/6/1957 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Drafted in 5th round, 114th overall pick, by Penn in 1967...
Injured on 6/22/1969 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1971, off Eugene Pyle (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/3/1971, off Herbert Almond (WT)...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1974...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1975...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/1/1977 to a 3-year deal worth $2,100,000 per year...
Released by Halifax on 4/7/1981...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 6/21/1981 to a minor league deal...
